services.h3.1: Nouma Trading & Logistics offers a wide range of logistics services and solutions. Our services include:
services.pt5: Carabobo (Valencia, Guacara, Los Guayos, San Diego, Nagunagua)
services.pt10: The route is consolidated and is coordinated based on the number of kilos per area.
services.pt11: Central Areas (Foreigners are charged the additional fee for the stop)
services.pt12: Purchases of a minimum of 1 drum and/or 8 bags or boxes
